name: Probably Archery
description: Manipulate your wrists, elbows and shoulders to get the arrow to the bow, draw it, aim and fire!Probably Archery gives the player more control over the minutia of their joint movements with tons of crazy scenarios to conquer, multiplayer battles to fight and brutal target challenges to dominate.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or later Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or AMD Radeon HD 3830 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or later Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Phenom II X4 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570, AMD Radeon HD 7750 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible

reviews.review_text: I CAN'T HIT ANYTHING   10/10  GOTY 2014    flying eggs confirmed OP, pls nerf
Too frustrating for me.
'I used to be a adventurer, but thenI took a arrow to the knee'  That sums up the whole game

'Hospital Park Trespasser: Surgeon Became Archer Edition'  Concept is good but controls are awful. Unnecessarily hard and trying over and over to nock the ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥it arrow and mostly can't shoot things is ruining the game. They have to change the both-hands-elbow-shoulder-controls to something else. Otherwise this is literally bull♥♥♥♥.  In the real life, this is easier than this. Because you don't need to think about what key to press to use your respective muscles.  I don't expect them to change controls but if there will be good update about controls, i'll try the game again and edit this review. Right now, not recommended.   EDIT:  Still, I don't recommend this game but since the last update, there are simplified elbow controls and nock assist. At least developers still updating the game and listening demands of players. Good to see this, keep it up guys.
I murdered a man with an apple as a head trying to shoot an apple off his apple head.  11/10  Would murder again
I hate this game so much and ive only played it for 7 minutes.
The most annoying piece of **** game! LOVE IT haha, multiple rage quits haha
Awful controls don't make a game; this is not a mechanic, it's a joke. Buy it if you're an idiot hipster who thinks irony is fun.  'GET IT, IT'S AWESOME BECAUSE IT'S SO DAMNED TERRIBLE! YAY!'
The next sequel of M&B should have the system of Probably ARchery adapted in the game
Do you think Surgeon Simulator is Hard? THIS game is hard!
It's QWOP in archery form.  10/10
Probably archery is definitely not fun.

This is basically ARTIFICIAL DIFFICULTY: THE GAME  The controls are HORRIBLE: >It forces inverse Y and X axes for your mouse movements. It makes manipulating your wrists and arms very complicated, and that's bad considering this is an aiming game. You know why is there no option to change this? BECAUSE ARTIFICIAL DIFFICULTY.  >Every time you shoot and then grab a new arrow, your right arm does not go back to its previous position. It insists on going somewhere else, and you have to fiddle around with your elbow and wrist controls just to nock the arrow again; AND if you don't position your hand exactly like you did on your previous shot (which is very likely), you will have nocked the arrow in a completely different direction and now you either have to redo it or have to adjust your left arm holding the bow to compensate, which is just as annoying.  The game would probably be fun if you're extremely good with the controls, but it is not at all worth the effort to get to that level. I really believe this game would have been great, but the controls are just really bad. No, don't think that they're challenging, they are just bad. Unplayable bad.  CONCLUSION: DON'T GET THIS GAME
Probably Archery? Probably not...
I PLAYED FOR 7 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ MINUTES AND CAN'T TAKE ANY MORE. IF YOU NUY THIS, THEN GOD HAVE MERCY ON YOUR POOR POOR SOUL.

The controls are confusing, the movement is clumsy, the learning curve is long with no payout or reward, and the playerbase is small so you're left having to play with bots. Great concept, horribly executed.

Super hard and impossible keyboard controls! The terrible controls make it impossible to play most of the game modes since they are either timed or have something running fast at you. It is nothing like Surgeon Simulator 2013 (SS)! Not even close. In fact, it makes SS 2013 seems easy to play next to this game! The controls are that bad. No funny bad either! Just BAD!!!  The Zombie soccer can be fun in short spurts, but only because there is a pistol to shoot with way limited ammo, but the controls to kick the ball suck, so that's hard to play also. Plus there are too many zombies and the screen starts to skip at about 3 fps sometimes, no matter what the screen resolution is set at!  Again, the controls for the bow are so bad, it makes the game unplayable at times! It takes you forever to adjust the bow just to be able to put the arrow in the string!!! It's really, really bad!!! I cannot recommend this came to anyone unless you like to get frustrated!!!  Here are my system specifications: iMac, i5 Quad-Core Intel processor 3.1GHZ, AMD Radeon HD 6970M with 1GB dedicated video RAM, 4GB system RAM, 1TB hard drive running OS X version 10.6.8.
Because the trajectories what make your fingers feel dumb.
This 'game' is taking the ♥♥♥♥ing LIVING! ♥♥♥♥.

i really wanted to like this game but it's controls are waaay to complicated if it had the option to play in a more simple way it would have been great because apart from chivalry as far as i can think there aren't many archery games on steam  the game is also very buggy   bugs that make actually playing the game are suprisingly frequent and to my knowledge this is not and early acces game   i will probably keep playing it here and there but for it's price it is definitely not worth it
very hard controll, no online servers. on the boring side.
This game is too hard and it has no story. iid recomend it if it was 2 dollars maybe but it is not worth 12 nor the 9 i paid while it was on sale
Great fun! It's hard and humiliating xD
I played one hour. stopped having fun. this isn't even a game I can say I am fine with buying as a thing to look at and learn how to not make a game. its just bland.
Worst game ever. Do not buy. You cannot even move your elbows. not working awful game.
It needs to be updated more.
